channel.description: Recent content in nginx on Chaosmatrix

item.title: HTTP Serving Compressed File
item.description: Abstract Most web browsers include built-in support for gzip, deflate, br Most programming languages include built-in support for gzip and deflate, and br typically has community support Nginx - ngx_http_gzip_static_module Conclusions: Check config: if gzip_static enable or not ? Check request header: client support gzip or not ? when using common algorithm, like “gzip”, skiping this seems no problem Mapping url to file path with given rule (filename extension is “.
